subject_terms_3: Badges Victoria Theatre and Concert Hall
context_2: This badge was issued for the South East Asia Cultural Festival that was held in Singapore
physical_appearance: "The image displays a badge. A drawing of the front of the former Singapore National Theatre can be seen at the centre of the plaque. The year '1963' and 'Singapore' are displayed below the drawing. Within the border of the larger and small circle, the words, ""South East Asia Cultural Festival"" is written between their circumferences. Below the circular badge
title_text: SEA badge (frame to be removed) SEA badge
subject_terms_1: ""Singapore Artiste"" is printed in white capital letters below the on the rectangular block" commemoratives festivals
